item.description:
SInce Katie has a plan (check out the message boards) lets head down to Bean Town and check out their stuff.

Meet at the Dover High School at 9:30, note to self, stop and get coffee first.

We'll plan to drive into Boston, park at BU or wherever magical Katie has inmind and then take the T to the different shops.

Lunch at Beer Works, so yummy, I once had watermellon beer there.

And then back to Dover around 6.

How's that sound?

oh and $2 for the driver for gas & tolls.
item.name: Boston Yarn Crawl -Saturday July 5th
